mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VACCINE_RESERVATION ( V_RES_NO, USER_NO, HOS_NO, GST_NO, PATIENT_NAME, PATIENT_BIRTHDAY, V_RES_DATE, V_RES_TIME, V_TYPE, RES_CONTENT, GENDER, PHONE, EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_V_RES_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{hosNo}, #{gstNo}, #{patientName}, #{patientBirthday}, #{vresDate}, #{vresTime}, #{vType}, #{resContent}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email} )
mapper.select: SELECT HOS_NO as hosNo, HOS_NAME as hosName, HOS_ADDRESS as hosAddress, HOS_TEL as hosTel, DEPARTMENT as department, HOS_START_TIME1 as hosStartTime1, HOS_CLOSE_TIME1 as hosEndTime1, HOS_START_TIME2 as hosStartTime2, HOS_CLOSE_TIME2 as hosEndTime2, HOS_LATITUDE as hosLatitude, HOS_LONGITUDE as hosLongitude FROM HOSPITAL_INFO

SELECT V_RES_NO as vresNo, USER_NO as userNo, HOS_NO as hosNo, GST_NO as gstNo, PATIENT_NAME as patientName, PATIENT_BIRTHDAY as patientBirthday, GENDER as gender, EMAIL as email, V_RES_DATE as vresDate, V_RES_TIME as vresTime, V_TYPE as vType, RES_CONTENT as resContent FROM VACCINE_RESERVATION WHERE V_RES_NO = #{resNo}
